articles.title: Miss the late Stan Lee? Might be time to chat with the comic book legend's AI-fueled avatar

articles.summary: Katy ISD's board of trustees reviewed a presentation about the district's current usage of artificial intelligence and its plans to expand that usage. John Alawneh, Chief Information Officer for KISD, presented a 'roadmap' for innovation and efficiency using artificial intelligence. He said the district is already leveraging AI to boost productivity and enhance daily operations. He also presented a plan for expanding AI to streamline processes further and deliver 24/7 support for staff, students, and parents.
